text: Ruth Wyler Messinger (born November 6, 1940) is an American politician and member of the Democratic Party as well as the Democratic Socialists of America. She was the Democratic nominee for Mayor of New York City in 1997 losing to Rudy Giuliani. Messinger was the 24th Borough President of Manhattan from 1990 to 1997. In 2015 she was named as one of The Forward 50 along with Senator Bernie Sanders. ==References== ==Other websites== *Jewish Women and the Feminist Revolution from the Jewish Women's Archive *Hazon website Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Jewish politicians Category:Manhattan borough presidents Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Ruth Messinger
